docs.abstract: J Brody on periodontal disease; causes, prevention and treatment described; drawing (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: VINCENT has bad breath that no mouthwash can erase. June's gums often bleed when she brushes her teeth. Rob erts front teeth have begun to spread out and the spaces between them get wider and wider.
